titleStmt.title: The wofull lamentation of Edward Smith a poore penitent prisoner in the iayle of Bedford, which he wrote a short time before his death. To the tune of, Dainty come thou to me.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Edward, poore penitent prisoner.

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name and date of publication from STC.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
